FROM    ubuntu:14.04

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y bind9 && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY zone_template /etc/bind/zone_template

EXPOSE 53/udp

ADD run /usr/local/bin/run
RUN chmod +x /usr/local/bin/run

CMD ["/usr/local/bin/run"]
